"}]}], "process_md": "_The advertisement is published in the newspapers, calling for applications by the Tamil Nadu Eyal Isai Nataka Mandram. _
**Step 1:** The interested applicant should visit (during office hours) the office Mandram and request a hard copy of the prescribed format of the application form from the concerned staff. 
**Step 2:** In the application form, fill in all the mandatory fields, paste the passport-sized photograph (signed across, if required), and attach copies of all the mandatory documents (self-attest, if required). 
**Step 3:** Submit the duly filled and signed application form along with the documents to the Tamil Nadu Eyal Isai Nataka__ Mandram.
